page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName can generate side Quests in the form of [item name=contract]. Each market has a delay between contract generations. This delay is increased depending on the contracts in the Market Machine. The $itemName cannot generate quests with the same objectives already in it.
There are many different side quests. Such as killing mobs, collecting items, scanning items, discovering locations, placing blocks and much more.
